get.desc: Get a list of all action groups in a resource group.

default.desc: An error occurred and the list of action groups could not be retrieved.

put.desc: Create a new action group or update an existing one.

params.name: actionGroup
params.desc: The action group to create or use for the update.

200.desc: An existing action group was successfully updated.

201.desc: A new action group was successfully created.

default.desc: An error occurred and the action group could not be created or updated.
An error occurred and the action group could not be retrieved. 404: The action group does not exist.

200.desc: The action group was successfully deleted.

204.desc: The action group does not exist. It may have already been deleted.

default.desc: An error occurred and the action group could not be deleted.

patch.desc: Updates an existing action group's tags. To update other fields use the CreateOrUpdate method.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.desc: An existing action group was successfully updated.

post.desc: Send test notifications to a set of provided receivers

params.name: notificationRequest
params.desc: The notification request body which includes the contact details

location.desc: The location header that has the polling uri.

default.desc: An error occurred while sending the test notifications
